text: manitarkale! Niccayamaka nam unkalai or an, oru pennilirunte pataittom; ninkal oruvarai oruvar arintu kollum poruttu. Pinnar, unkalaik kilaikalakavum, kottirankalakavum akkinom; (akave) unkalil evar mikavum payapaktiyutaiyavaraka irukkinraro, avartam allahvitattil, niccayamaka mikka kanniyamanavar. Niccayamaka allah nankaripavan, (yavarraiyum culantu) terintavan
